issue.message: Method `Builder()` is a flagged API and should be inside an `if (Flags.newGeocoder())` check (or annotate the surrounding method `getFromLocation` with `@FlaggedApi(Flags.FLAG_NEW_GEOCODER) to transfer requirement to caller`)

Method `setCallingAttributionTag()` is a flagged API and should be inside an `if (Flags.newGeocoder())` check (or annotate the surrounding method `getFromLocation` with `@FlaggedApi(Flags.FLAG_NEW_GEOCODER) to transfer requirement to caller`)

Method `build()` is a flagged API and should be inside an `if (Flags.newGeocoder())` check (or annotate the surrounding method `getFromLocation` with `@FlaggedApi(Flags.FLAG_NEW_GEOCODER) to transfer requirement to caller`)

Method `Builder()` is a flagged API and should be inside an `if (Flags.newGeocoder())` check (or annotate the surrounding method `getFromLocationName` with `@FlaggedApi(Flags.FLAG_NEW_GEOCODER) to transfer requirement to caller`)

Method `setCallingAttributionTag()` is a flagged API and should be inside an `if (Flags.newGeocoder())` check (or annotate the surrounding method `getFromLocationName` with `@FlaggedApi(Flags.FLAG_NEW_GEOCODER) to transfer requirement to caller`)

Method `build()` is a flagged API and should be inside an `if (Flags.newGeocoder())` check (or annotate the surrounding method `getFromLocationName` with `@FlaggedApi(Flags.FLAG_NEW_GEOCODER) to transfer requirement to caller`)

Method `getWorkSource()` is a flagged API and should be inside an `if (Flags.gnssApiMeasurementRequestWorkSource())` check (or annotate the surrounding method `Builder` with `@FlaggedApi(Flags.FLAG_GNSS_API_MEASUREMENT_REQUEST_WORK_SOURCE) to transfer requirement to caller`)
